trans-unit.source: Defines an object used to draw lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: Define um objecto utilizado para desenhar linhas e curvas.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: A Pen draws a line of specified width and style.
trans-unit.target: Uma caneta desenha uma linha da largura especificada e estilo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> property to draw several varieties of dashed lines.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>propriedade para desenhar varieties várias das linhas tracejadas.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: The line drawn by a Pen can be filled in a variety of fill styles, including solid colors and textures.
trans-unit.target: A linha desenhada por uma caneta pode ser preenchida uma variedade de estilos de preenchimento, incluindo cores sólidas e textures.

trans-unit.source: The fill style depends on brush or texture that is used as the fill object.
trans-unit.target: O estilo de preenchimento depende de pincel ou texture que é utilizado como o objeto de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Brush%2A> property determines how the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> draws lines.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Brush%2A>propriedade determina como o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>desenha linhas.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Brush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Lines are drawn as if they are filled rectangles, with the characteristics of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: As linhas são desenhadas como se retângulos manchas, com as características de <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush> especificado

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property of the new <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> is set to 1 (the default).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>propriedade da nova <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>está definida como 1 (predefinição).</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the fill properties of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que determina as propriedades de preenchimento deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified color.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> classe com a cor especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property is set to the color specified by the `color` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Color>propriedade está definida para a cor especificada pelo `color` parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property is set to 1 (the default).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>propriedade está definida como 1 (predefinição).</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that indicates the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que indica a cor disto <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> and <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> e <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> is set to the color specified in the `brush` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter, and the units are set to <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>está definido para a cor especificados no `brush` parâmetro, a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>propriedade está definida como o valor especificado no `width` parâmetro e as unidades estão definidas como <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>.</xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Note that the `brush` parameter also specifies the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o `brush` parâmetro especifica também a <xref:System.Drawing.Color>propriedade de <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A `width` of 0 will result in the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> drawing as if the width were 1.
trans-unit.target: A `width` 0 resultará no <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>desenho como se a largura foram 1.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que determina as características deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The width of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura do novo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> and <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> e <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>Propriedades.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property is set to the color specified by the `color` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Color>propriedade está definida para a cor especificada pelo `color` parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A> property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>propriedade está definida como o valor especificado no `width` parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A `width` of 0 will result in the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> drawing as if the width were 1.
trans-unit.target: A `width` 0 resultará no <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>desenho como se a largura foram 1.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that indicates the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que indica a cor disto <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating the width of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica a largura disto <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property determines how the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> draws closed curves and polygons.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade determina como o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>desenha curvas fechadas e de polígonos.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> enumeration specifies five values; however, only two values—<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>—will change the appearance of a drawn line.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>enumeração Especifica cinco valores; no entanto, apenas dois valores —<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>— irá alterar o aspeto de uma linha desenhada.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> is the default value for this property and specifies that the width of the pen is centered on the outline of the curve or polygon.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>é o valor predefinido para esta propriedade e especifica que a largura da caneta centra-se no contorno da curva ou polígono.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> for this property specifies that the width of the pen is inside the outline of the curve or polygon.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>para esta propriedade especifica que a largura da caneta dentro do contorno da curva ou polígono.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: The other three values, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, will result in a pen that is centered.
trans-unit.target: Outros três valores, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>, irá resultar numa caneta que centra-se.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> that has its alignment set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> will yield unreliable results, sometimes drawing in the inset position and sometimes in the centered position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>que tem o alinhamento definido como <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>irá produzir resultados pouco fiáveis, por vezes de desenho na posição inset e, por vezes, na posição centrada.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Also, an inset pen cannot be used to draw compound lines and cannot draw dashed lines with <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap> dash caps.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, uma caneta inset não pode ser utilizada para desenhar linhas compostas e não pode desenhar tracejada com <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>caps. traço</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"></xref> that represents the alignment for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"> </xref> que representa o alinhamento para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Alignment property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Alinhamento definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines attributes of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que determina os atributos desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Assigning this property causes the pen to draw filled lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: Atribuir esta propriedade faz com que a caneta desenhar linhas manchas e curvas.

trans-unit.source: It overrides the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a <xref:System.Drawing.Color>propriedade de <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines attributes of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que determina os atributos desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Brush property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de pincel está definida num imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that can be cast to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que pode ser convertido para um <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor disto <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que representa a cor deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Color property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de cor está definida num imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of values that specifies a compound pen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma matriz de valores que especifica uma caneta composta.

trans-unit.source: A compound pen draws a compound line made up of parallel lines and spaces.
trans-unit.target: Uma caneta composta desenha uma linha composta constituída por linhas paralelas e espaços.

trans-unit.source: A compound line is made up of alternating parallel lines and spaces of varying widths.
trans-unit.target: Uma linha composta é constituída por alternar linhas paralelas e espaços de larguras variadas.

trans-unit.source: The values in the array specify the starting points of each component of the compound line relative to the pen's width.
trans-unit.target: Os valores na matriz especificam os pontos de partida de cada componente da linha composta relativamente à largura de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The first value in the array specifies where the first component (a line) begins as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro valor na matriz especifica em que o primeiro componente (uma linha) começa como a fração da distância entre a largura de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The second value in the array specifies the beginning of the next component (a space) as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen.
trans-unit.target: O segundo valor na matriz Especifica o início do componente seguinte (um espaço) como a fração da distância em toda a largura de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The final value in the array specifies where the last component ends.
trans-unit.target: O valor final na matriz Especifica onde termina o último componente.

trans-unit.source: Suppose you want a pen to draw two parallel lines where the width of the first line is 20 percent of the pen's width, the width of the space that separates the two lines is 50 percent of the pen' s width, and the width of the second line is 30 percent of the pen's width.
trans-unit.target: Suponha que pretende uma caneta para desenhar dois paralelas onde a largura da primeira linha é 20 por cento da largura de caneta, a largura do espaço de que o separa duas linhas é 50 por cento da caneta ' s largura e a largura da segunda linha é 30 por cento da largura de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Start by creating a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> and an array of real numbers.
trans-unit.target: Comece por criar um <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>e uma matriz de números de real.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Set the compound array by passing the array with the values 0.0, 0.2, 0.7, and 1.0 to this property.
trans-unit.target: Defina a matriz composta transferindo a matriz com os valores 0,0, 0,2, 0,7 e 1.0 para esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Do not set this property if the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> has its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Não defina esta propriedade se <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>tem a respetiva <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: An array of real numbers that specifies the compound array.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de números reais que especifica a matriz composta.

trans-unit.source: The elements in the array must be in increasing order, not less than 0, and not greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos na matriz tem de ser aumentar a ordem, não inferior a 0 e não superior a 1.

trans-unit.source: The CompoundArray property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: CompoundArray definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom cap to use at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um limite personalizado para utilizar no final de linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"></xref> that represents the cap used at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"> </xref> que representa a extremidade utilizada no final de linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CustomEndCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: CustomEndCap definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom cap to use at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um limite personalizado para utilizar o início do linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"></xref> that represents the cap used at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap"> </xref> que representa a extremidade utilizada no início de linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CustomStartCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: CustomStartCap definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cap style used at the end of the dashes that make up dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de extremidade utilizado no final dos traços que compõem linhas tracejadas desenhadas com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Do not set this property to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap> if the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> has its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Não definir esta propriedade como <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>se <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>tem a respetiva <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"></xref> values that represents the cap style used at the beginning and end of the dashes that make up dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"> </xref> valores que representa o estilo de extremidade utilizado no início e fim dos traços que compõem linhas tracejadas desenhadas com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashCap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DashCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: DashCap definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance from the start of a line to the beginning of a dash pattern.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância desde o início de uma linha para o início de um padrão de travessão.

trans-unit.source: The distance from the start of a line to the beginning of a dash pattern.
trans-unit.target: A distância desde o início de uma linha para o início de um padrão de travessão.

trans-unit.source: The DashOffset property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: DashOffset definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of custom dashes and spaces.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma matriz de traços personalizados e espaços.

trans-unit.source: Assigning a value other than `null` to this property will set the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> property for this <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Atribuir um valor diferente de `null` para esta propriedade definirá a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>propriedade para este <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>para <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: The elements in the `dashArray` array set the length of each dash and space in the dash pattern.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos de `dashArray` matriz definir o período de cada dash e espaço no padrão de travessão.

trans-unit.source: The first element sets the length of a dash, the second element sets the length of a space, the third element sets the length of a dash, and so on.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro elemento define o comprimento de um traço, o segundo elemento define o comprimento de um espaço, o elemento terceiro define o comprimento de um traço e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, each element should be a non-zero positive number.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, cada elemento deve ser um número positivo diferente de zero.

trans-unit.source: The length of each dash and space in the dash pattern is the product of the element value in the array and the width of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento de cada travessão e espaço no padrão de dash é o produto do valor do elemento na matriz e a largura do <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: An array of real numbers that specifies the lengths of alternating dashes and spaces in dashed lines.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de números de real que especifica os comprimentos das alternar espaços linhas tracejada e travessões.

trans-unit.source: The DashPattern property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: DashPattern definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style used for dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo utilizado para linhas tracejadas desenhadas com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> for this property specifies that a custom pattern of dashes and spaces, defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> property, makes up lines drawn with this <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>para esta propriedade especifica que um padrão personalizado de travessões e espaços, definido pela <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A>propriedade, compõe linhas desenhadas com este <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> and the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> property is `null`, the pen draws solid lines.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor desta propriedade é <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>e o valor do <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A>propriedade é `null`, a caneta desenha linhas sólidas.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"></xref> that represents the style used for dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo utilizado para linhas tracejadas desenhadas com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DashStyle property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: DashStyle definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose permite que os recursos utilizados por este <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>para possível reatribuir porque para outros fins.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>foi occupying.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cap style used at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de extremidade utilizado no final de linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> values that represents the cap style used at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> valores que representa o estilo de extremidade utilizado no final de linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The EndCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: EndCap definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto para tentar libertar recursos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes de que reclamada a através da recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de associação for the ends of duas linhas consecutivos desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A line join is the common area that is formed by two lines whose ends meet or overlap.
trans-unit.target: Uma associação de linha é a área comuns que está formada por duas linhas cujas extremidades cumpriram ou se podem sobrepor.

trans-unit.source: There are three line join styles: miter, bevel, and round.
trans-unit.target: Existem três estilos de associação de linha: miter, bevel e arredondar.

trans-unit.source: When you specify a line join style for a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object, that join style will be applied to all the connected lines in any <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object drawn using that pen.The following illustration shows the results of the beveled line join example.
trans-unit.target: Quando especificar um estilo de associação de linha para um objeto de <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>, que o estilo de associação será aplicado a todas as linhas ligadas em qualquer objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>desenhado utilizando esse caneta. A ilustração seguinte mostra os resultados de exemplo de associação a linha beveled.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: ![Pens](~/add/media/pens5.gif "Pens")
trans-unit.target: ![Pens](~/add/media/pens5.gif "Pens")

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin"></xref> that represents the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin"> </xref> que representa o estilo de associação for the ends of duas linhas consecutivos desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The LineJoin property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: LineJoin definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o limite da espessura da associação a um canto mitered.

trans-unit.source: The miter length is the distance from the intersection of the line walls on the inside of the join to the intersection of the line walls outside of the join.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento de miter é a distância da interseção dos paredes de linha no interior da associação a um para a interseção dos paredes de linha fora da associação.

trans-unit.source: The miter length can be large when the angle between two lines is small.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento de miter pode ser grande quando o ângulo entre duas linhas é pequeno.

trans-unit.source: The miter limit is the maximum allowed ratio of miter length to stroke width.
trans-unit.target: O limite de miter é o rácio máximo permitido de comprimento de miter para largura stroke.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10.0f.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é 10.0f.

trans-unit.source: If the miter length of the join of the intersection exceeds the limit of the join, then the join will be beveled to keep it within the limit of the join of the intersection.
trans-unit.target: Se o comprimento de miter de associação de intersecção excede o limite da associação a um, a associação será beveled para mantê-los dentro do limite de associação de intersecção.

trans-unit.source: The limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.
trans-unit.target: O limite da espessura da associação a um no canto mitered.

trans-unit.source: The MiterLimit property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: MiterLimit definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the transformation matrix for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Multiplica a matriz de transformação para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> especificado por <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the multiplication matrix specified in the `matrix` parameter to the transformation matrix for the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: Este método prepends a matriz de multiplicação especificada no `matrix` parâmetro para a matriz de transformação para a operação de multiplicação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> object by which to multiply the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> objeto pelo qual multiplicar a matriz de transformação.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the transformation matrix for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Multiplica a matriz de transformação para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> especificado por <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> enumeration element (either prepend or append) specified by the `order` parameter to carry out the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: Este método utiliza o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>elemento da enumeração (preceder ou acrescentar) especificado pelo `order` parâmetro para realizar a operação de multiplicação.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> by which to multiply the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> pelo qual multiplicar a matriz de transformação.

trans-unit.source: The order in which to perform the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: A ordem pela qual efetuar a operação de multiplicação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo das linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> can draw solid lines, filled lines, or textured lines, depending on the style specified by a member of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>pode desenhar linhas sólidas, linhas manchas ou linhas textured, consoante o estilo especificado por um membro a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType>enumeração.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the style of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType"> </xref> enumeração que especifica o estilo das linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resets the geometric transformation matrix for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> to identity.
trans-unit.target: Repõe a matriz de geométrica transformação para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> à identidade.

trans-unit.source: Rotates the local geometric transformation by the specified angle.
trans-unit.target: Roda a transformação geométrica local através do ângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the rotation to the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Este método prepends a rotação para a transformação.

trans-unit.source: Because the shape of a pen is circular, a rotation does not have any visible effect unless the pen is scaled in the x- or y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Como a forma de uma caneta é circular, uma rotação não tem qualquer efeito visível, a menos que a caneta é escalada na direção axis x ou y.

trans-unit.source: The angle of rotation.
trans-unit.target: O ângulo de rotação.

trans-unit.source: Rotates the local geometric transformation by the specified angle in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Roda a transformação geométrica local através do ângulo especificado pela ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: Because the shape of a pen is circular, a rotation does not have any visible effect unless the pen is scaled in the x- or y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: Como a forma de uma caneta é circular, uma rotação não tem qualquer efeito visível, a menos que a caneta é escalada na direção axis x ou y.

trans-unit.source: The angle of rotation.
trans-unit.target: O ângulo de rotação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> that specifies whether to append or prepend the rotation matrix.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> que especifica se pretende acrescentar ou preceder a matriz de rotação.

trans-unit.source: Scales the local geometric transformation by the specified factors.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona a transformação geométrica local pelos fatores especificados.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the scaling matrix to the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Este método prepends a matriz de dimensionamento para a transformação.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the x-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: O fator pelo qual a transformação de escala na direção de eixo x.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: O fator pelo qual a transformação de escala na direção de eixo y.

trans-unit.source: Scales the local geometric transformation by the specified factors in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona a transformação geométrica local pelos fatores especificados pela ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the x-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: O fator pelo qual a transformação de escala na direção de eixo x.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which to scale the transformation in the y-axis direction.
trans-unit.target: O fator pelo qual a transformação de escala na direção de eixo y.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> that specifies whether to append or prepend the scaling matrix.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> que especifica se pretende acrescentar ou preceder a matriz de dimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: Sets the values that determine the style of cap used to end lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define os valores que determinam o estilo da extremidade utilizado para linhas de fim desenhadas por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> that represents the cap style to use at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> que representa o estilo de extremidade a utilizar o início do linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> that represents the cap style to use at the end of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> que representa o estilo de extremidade a utilizar no final de linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> that represents the cap style to use at the beginning or end of dashed lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> que representa o estilo de extremidade a utilizar no início ou fim das linhas tracejadas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cap style used at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de extremidade utilizado no início de linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref> values that represents the cap style used at the beginning of lines drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref> valores que representa o estilo de extremidade utilizado no início de linhas desenhado com esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The StartCap property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: StartCap definir a propriedade é um imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a copy of the geometric transformation for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cópia da transformação para este geométrica <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property defines an elliptical shape for the pen tip.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade define uma forma elíptica para a sugestão de caneta.

trans-unit.source: This ellipse is obtained from the default circular shape by applying the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Este elipse é obtida a partir de forma circular predefinido aplicando a matriz de transformação.

trans-unit.source: Note that the translation portion of the matrix is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que a parte de tradução de matriz é ignorada.

trans-unit.source: Because the matrix returned and by the Transform property is a copy of the pen's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: Porque a matriz devolvido e pela transformação propriedade é uma cópia da transformação geométrica a caneta, deve eliminar de matriz quando já não precisar dele.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that represents the geometric transformation for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> que representa a transformação para este geométrica <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Transform property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A transformação propriedade está definida uma imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Translates the local geometric transformation by the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Converte a transformação geométrica local pelas dimensões especificadas.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the translation to the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Este método prepends a tradução para a transformação.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in x.
trans-unit.target: O valor da tradução no x.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in y.
trans-unit.target: O valor da tradução na y.

trans-unit.source: Translates the local geometric transformation by the specified dimensions in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Converte a transformação geométrica local pelas dimensões especificadas pela ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in x.
trans-unit.target: O valor da tradução no x.

trans-unit.source: The value of the translation in y.
trans-unit.target: O valor da tradução na y.

trans-unit.source: The order (prepend or append) in which to apply the translation.
trans-unit.target: A ordem (preceder ou acrescentar) na qual pretende aplicar a tradução.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, in units of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura de isto <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, em unidades do <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objecto utilizado para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: You can access the unit of measure of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object using its <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder a unidade de medida do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto utilizando o respetivo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The unit of measure is typically pixels.
trans-unit.target: A unidade de medida é normalmente pixéis.

trans-unit.source: A Width of 0 will result in the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> drawing as if the Width were 1.
trans-unit.target: Uma largura de 0 resultará no <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>desenho como se a largura foram 1.</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: The width of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura disto <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Width property is set on an immutable <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>, such as those returned by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Width está definida num imutável <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>, tais como devolvido pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Pens"> </xref> classe.
